original_text: But and if that servant say in his heart, My lord delayeth his coming; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens, and to eat and drink, and to be drunken;
korean_text: 만일 그 종이 마음에 생각하기를 주인이 더디 오리라 하여 남녀 종들을 때리며 먹고 마시고 취하게 되면

sentences.original_text: But if that servant say in his heart
and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 남종들과 여종들을 때리기 시작할 것이며
